Extract 'desc' arguments from all test_that functions from .R script files

Extract 'desc' arguments from all test_that functions from .R script files

extract_test_that_desc(infile)

Arguments

infile

character. Path to an .R script file, or a list of such paths; usually created with list.files("/path/to/directory")

Value

content of the 'desc' arguments of test_that functions

  • Arguments
  • Value
